meanings.definition: No longer remembered; not recalled to mind.
meanings.sent1: The old toy was forgotten in the attic for many years.
meanings.sent2: The forgotten name of the street was finally remembered by the locals.
meanings.sent3: The forgotten homework assignment caused quite a surprise when it resurfaced.
meanings.sent4: Her forgotten promise lingered in the air, unfulfilled and distant.
meanings.sent5: The forgotten melody played softly in the background, evoking nostalgia.

meanings.sent1: The forgotten umbrella was left behind at the bus stop.
meanings.sent2: The forgotten keys were found on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent3: The forgotten sandwich in the fridge became a science experiment.
meanings.sent4: The forgotten garden withered away, unnoticed and uncared for.
meanings.sent5: The forgotten book sat on the shelf, collecting dust and loneliness.

meanings.definition: Having been left alone or abandoned.
meanings.sent1: The forgotten puppy waited patiently outside the door.
meanings.sent2: The forgotten house at the end of the street looked eerie in the moonlight.
meanings.sent3: The forgotten plant in the corner struggled to survive without water.
meanings.sent4: The forgotten building stood as a silent reminder of the past.
meanings.sent5: The forgotten road led to a mysterious and overgrown forest.
